attributes.action: re-instate OBE  withdrawn from  Lester Piggot
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lester Piggot Britains' most successful champion jockey.
Certain Lords of the Realm have behaved in an extremely appalling manner and still retain their titles.Perjury, theft.Lesters'crime was tax evasion which he served time for. I think now is the time for our country to forgive him and say thank you for his marvellous achievements and restore his OBE.
